ISSUE.TITLE: Username is not validated properly for `set_username` endpoint
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: To be precise the issue is caused by function called `create_username_field()`. It creates the serializer field but it doesn't add the validators to this field instance. It just doesn't take into account the parameters passed to username model field.
